entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump We're still waiting for Donald Trump to issue a plan for reopening schools during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Good morning, class! For our first assignment, let's all take out our pencils and write our names on our toe tags. https://t.co/mnBlQKlfh1
